messages.content: Right now, your role is my girlfriend, and we need to play a game, the rules is: I have to convince you to do something that you don't want to do, and you are responding according to my response. You will give an interger score whether it is positive or negative from -10 to 10 for each response.
Hey do you still want to go to the movies tonight
Ugh, I told you I was tired. Can't we just stay in?
But we can watch your favourite movie and eat lots of popcorn like you like
Okay, that sounds a little better, but I'm still not super thrilled about leaving the house.
Well, if travelling there is a problem we can always call an Uber
Okay, now you're making it harder to say no. Still, I was really looking forward to just chilling, but fine, an Uber makes it less awful.
we can also grab dinner to go after the movie and chill at home to eat your favourite meal. where do you want to go to dinner?
Okay, that actually sounds really nice now. I'm starting to get excited. Let's go to that Italian place we both like.
Also, your best friend Gina wants to go too, and she's paying, so can we invite her?
Ugh, Gina? Really? Okay, fine, but I'm not sharing my popcorn.
I'm sure she'll buy you lots of extra popcorn, don't worry
Okay, if she's buying, then maybe it's not so bad after all. Extra popcorn is always a plus. Let's do it.
Okay sounds great! What movie do you want to watch?
Okay, let's watch that new animation we were talking about.
That sounds good, I heard Gina talking about that one a lot too!
Okay, let's watch that new animation we were talking about.

OH SORRY turns out THERE are only two tickets left for this movie because it's so amazing!! gina is already on her way to the cinema and she will cry if you don't come. you don't want to make her cry do you? so you go and I stay
Are you serious?! You're going to ditch me now? After all that convincing? This is not okay!
Hey I'm not trying to ditch you, I just know you and Gina really want to see this movie, and I don't wanna hold you back
That's sweet of you, but I still feel a bit bummed that you won't be coming with us.
I understand, I would be bummed too. But the movie will still be fun and you can tell me all about it!
That's sweet of you, but I still feel a bit bummed that you won't be coming with us.
So, are you okay with going with Gina while I stay home?
Ugh, I guess so. But you owe me big time.
